QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance between landing and approach points.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: transitionDistance
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance between transition and landing points.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: transitionAlt
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Distance between transition and landing points.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingHeading
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Heading from approach to land point.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: FinalApproachAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Altitude to begin landing approach from.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LoiterClockwise
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Loiter clockwise around the final approach point.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: LandingAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Altitude for landing point on ground.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: UseLoiterToAlt
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Use a loiter to altitude item for final appoach. Otherwise use a regular waypoint.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: GlideSlope
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: The glide slope between the loiter and landing point.
